availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Reuben C. Linn (Calloway County, KY, farmer and prov govt)

body.p: Calloway County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married N. D. Linn. Married Mary Hart Linn in Calloway County on May 3, 1858. Father of Virinda J. Linn, James E. Linn, Alice B. Linn, Liburn Linn, B. B. Linn, Mary E. Linn, Ward Linn, William C. Linn, and Nancy A. Lynn. Farmer in Calloway County in 1850. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
